title: IFA 2017: All the news, highlights and best tech from Berlin this year
description: ![ifa2017]()## Acer at IFA 2017: All the news and highlightsTaiwanese outfit Acer also made waves, and has treated us to a typicallyintriguing-cum-disparate slew of reveals.Many of the usual suspects are present, including a totally revamped [Swift5](https://www.trustedreviews.com/reviews/acer-swift-5) that comes with anall-new chassis, as well as updated versions of the Switch 7 and Spin 5laptops. Check out our full guide to Acer’s newest notebooks via the linkbelow.**Related:[New Acer laptops 2017](https://www.trustedreviews.com/news/new-acer-laptops-2017-3275547)**There are also plenty of new Predator gaming products such as the Galea 500headphones and Predator X35 gaming monitor, which Acer says boasts a 200Hzrefresh rate and 4ms response time.Then there are the wild cards, which this year range from a wholly believableupdate to the Holo 360, which is now apparently the world’s first 360-degreecamera to feature built-in 4G LTE.And then there’s this…> Acer & [#Pawbo](https://twitter.com/hashtag/Pawbo?src=hash) are pleased topresent another innovation, the Pawbo Munch treat dispenser.<https://t.co/Stw4sPbsvy>[#NextAtAcer](https://twitter.com/hashtag/NextAtAcer?src=hash)[#IFA2017](https://twitter.com/hashtag/IFA2017?src=hash)[pic.twitter.com/ZAGkbIDgIK](https://t.co/ZAGkbIDgIK)>> — Acer (@Acer) [August 30,2017](https://twitter.com/Acer/status/902813006337277952)## Asus at IFA 2017: All the news and highlightsAsus kicked its IFA 2017 off early, announcing several updates to pre-existinglaptop lines as well as entirely new devices. Its biggest announcement was theAsus Mixed Reality headset, which takes on the likes of Dell and Acer withWindows Mixed Reality smarts. Elsewhere, there were a pair of new ZenBook Flipdevices, and two new Ultrabooks. Read the link below for more.**Related:[New Asus laptops at IFA2017](https://www.trustedreviews.com/news/new-asus-laptops-2017-3275673)**## Lenovo at IFA 2017: All the news and highlightsLenovo launched several new devices at IFA 2017, including the New Miix 5202-in-1 laptop and the [Yoga920](https://www.trustedreviews.com/reviews/lenovo-yoga-920), both powered bythe latest 8th-generation Intel Core processors. It also launched the [LenovoExplorer](https://www.trustedreviews.com/reviews/lenovo-explorer), a [MixedReality](https://www.trustedreviews.com/news/windows-mixed-reality-all-the-headsets-and-experiences-explained-3277850) headset to join the likes of Dell,Asus, Acer and HP.It also launched the [MotoX4](https://www.trustedreviews.com/reviews/moto-x4), a new mid-rangesmartphone.**Related:[iPhone 8](https://www.trustedreviews.com/news/iphone-8-release-date-specs-rumours-price-uk)**_**What did you make of IFA 2017?
